title: Atiq Ur Rehman
text:
Master of Statistics
Australian National University, Canberra, Australia
Feb 2023 – Nov 2024
Courses:
STATISTICAL INFERENCE | STATISTICAL LEARNING | APPLIED TIME SERIES ANALYSIS | PROGRAMMING FOR SCIENTISTS (Python) | INTRODUCTION TO BAYESIAN DATA ANALYSIS | GENERALISED LINEAR MODELLING | BIOSTATISTICS IN POPULATION HEALTH | DESIGN OF EXPERIMENTS AND SURVEYS | RELATIONAL DATABASES | ECONOMETRIC METHODS AND MODELLING | ADVANCED MATHEMATICAL STATISTICS |


MPhil in Statistics
International Islamic University, Islamabad, Pakistan
Sep 2018 – May 2021
Courses: LINEAR MODELS | APPLIED ECONOMETRICS | ADVANCED ECONOMETRICS | SURVEY SAMPLING | MULTIVARIATE METHODS | STATISTICAL INFERENCE | COMPUTATIONAL STATISTICS | BAYESIAN STATISTICS |


Bachelor of Science (BS) in Statistics
University of Peshawar, Peshawar, Pakistan
2013 – 2017
Thesis:
- High-dimensional covariance matrix regularisation using more informative target matrices.
